enemies

Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • enemies.Enemy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Renderable, Tickable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnimationHook, Hook, Net, Pollutant, TheHuman, Trash

    public abstract class Enemy
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, Tickable, Renderable
    Enemy is the overarching abstract class that defines the behavior of enemies in the game. An Enemy can be non moving, like a banana, or active, like a human.
    Author:
    abraham
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Creates and enemy with initial x,y and a default health level
